description.text: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.

ru.original: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.
ru.translation: После кораблекрушения десять героев оказались на необитаемом острове. Настоящая битва только начинается. Два куба и база.

es.original: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.
es.translation:
Una isla desierta con diez náufragos beligerantes.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.
de.translation: Zehn gestrandete Helden führen auf dieser einsamen Insel ihren Kampf fort. Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis.

pt.original: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.
pt.translation: Dez heróis náufragos foram abandonados nesta ilha para continuar suas batalhas. Dois Cubos e uma Base.

fr.original: A redesign of the alpha version of Wilson's Bay, this map features an upgraded mid, with all three cubes close to the action. Two Cubes and a Base.
fr.translation: Dix héros naufragés sur une île : le combat continue. Deux cubes et une base.
